title: What movies have Drew Barrymore and Adam Sandler starred in together?

og.title: What movies have Drew Barrymore and Adam Sandler starred in together?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 6): The Wedding Singer (1998)

IMDb: 6,8

Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.
